keyMoments.title: Gives Luffy the Key to Ace's Handcuffs
keyMoments.description: Hancock secretly provides Luffy with the key to Ace's handcuffs, demonstrating her resourcefulness and commitment to helping him.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hancock's dedication to Luffy and her willingness to defy the World Government to help him save Ace.

keyMoments.title: Wedding Fantasy on Amazon Lily
keyMoments.description: After Luffy hugs her in gratitude, Hancock fantasizes about a wedding ceremony between herself and Luffy on Amazon Lily, complete with the Kuja tribe as witnesses and a red string of fate connecting them.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the depth of Hancock's romantic feelings for Luffy and provides comedic relief during the intense battle.

keyMoments.title: Breaks Smoker's Jitte to Protect Luffy
keyMoments.description: When Smoker attacks Luffy, Hancock intervenes with her Perfume Femur kick, breaking Smoker's seastone-tipped jitte in half.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hancock actively fighting other Marines to protect Luffy, prioritizing him over her duties as a Warlord.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Learns of Kuma's Complete Transformation
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals to Ivankov that Kuma has been completely transformed by Vegapunk, with his memories and humanity erased. This revelation deeply affects Ivankov.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Ivankov's past connection to Kuma through the Revolutionary Army and sets up his motivation to restore Kuma's memories.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Ganmen Spectrum
keyMoments.description: Ivankov uses Ganmen Spectrum for the first time, spinning rapidly to create multiple reflections of his head as a distraction.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ivankov's unique fighting style and expands his known abilities.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Galaxy Wink
keyMoments.description: Ivankov unleashes Galaxy Wink, his most powerful wink-based attack, firing numerous Death Winks from all directions at Kuma.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the full extent of Ivankov's combat abilities and his determination to save Kuma.

abilities.description: Ivankov spins very quickly and creates reflections of his head all around him as a distraction or setup move.
After using Ganmen Spectrum, Ivankov unleashes numerous Death Winks from all directions onto his target by rapidly shaking his head and winking in quick succession.

relationships.description: Ivankov and Kuma knew each other from the Revolutionary Army. Ivankov is devastated to learn of Kuma's complete transformation.

evolutionMoments.description: Ivankov learns from Doflamingo that Kuma has been completely transformed and vows to restore his memories.

reveals.information: Had a connection to Kuma through the Revolutionary Army

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Kuma's Complete Transformation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo reveals that Kuma volunteered to become the World Government's test patient and that Vegapunk completed the final modifications days before Ace's execution, completely erasing his memories and humanity.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Kuma's current mindless state and marks the completion of his transformation into the Pacifista prototype (PX-0). This is a pivotal moment revealing Kuma's tragic fate.

reveals.information: Volunteered to become the World Government's test patient for the Pacifista project
Vegapunk completed final modifications on Kuma days before Ace's execution, erasing his memories and humanity completely

keyMoments.title: First Use of Brilliant Punk
keyMoments.description: Jozu uses Brilliant Punk for the first time, a powerful tackle where he rushes at high speed and slams his diamond-transformed forearm into Crocodile, launching him back.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jozu's combat prowess as a division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and showcases a new technique.

abilities.description: A powerful tackle where Jozu rushes towards an enemy at high speed and slams them with his diamond-transformed forearm, dealing damage and launching the target a fair distance back.

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Reveals Kuma's Transformation to Ivankov
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo explains to Ivankov that Kuma has been completely modified by Vegapunk, volunteering himself to become the Government's test patient with his final modifications completed days before.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Doflamingo's knowledge of classified World Government projects and his willingness to share information to manipulate others.
keyMoments.quote: Kuma volunteered himself to become the Government's test patient.

keyMoments.title: Proposes Alliance to Crocodile
keyMoments.description: After saving Crocodile from Jozu's attack, Doflamingo proposes they form an alliance against their common enemies, despite Crocodile's threats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Doflamingo's manipulative nature and strategic thinking during the war.

reveals.information: Has detailed knowledge of the Pacifista project and Vegapunk's modifications to Kuma

name.japanese: ジュラキュール・ミホーク

keyMoments.title: Blocks Luffy's Path at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Mihawk positions himself in Luffy's path, blocking his advance toward the execution platform. He internally apologizes to Shanks but declares he will test whether fate is on Luffy's side.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a major obstacle for Luffy's rescue mission and shows Mihawk's acknowledgment of Luffy's connection to Shanks while maintaining his commitment to his Warlord duties.
